page.title: 18CHAIR MAKING
page.content:
For many years,Holcombe Rogus was a most important centre for chair making.I have decided to write about this,not because it is still going on but because there is hardly anything written about it and I think that it could easily be forgotten that this industry ever existed.
Until the early years of this century,this was all organised in Holcombe Rogus as a Cottage Industry.
It was very well organised and everybody had their own particular job to do.The chairs were stacked on the verges outside the village as they awaited the next stage of work.All of the chairs for Exeter Cathedral were made in Holcombe Rogus.
